SEARCH
Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class ResourceDao

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<ResourceEntity>
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.ResourceDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ResourceDao extends AbstractDao<ResourceEntity>
The ResourceDao class provides database operations for ResourceEntity instances. It extends the AbstractDao class to inherit common database operations.
See Also:

    • merge

      public void merge(ResourceEntity resource)
      Merges the state of the given resource into the current persistence context.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to be merged.

    • findById

      public ResourceEntity findById(int id)
      Finds a resource by the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the resource to be found. The id is unique for each resource. It is used to identify the resource. It is an integer.

    • findIdByName

      public int findIdByName(String name)
      Finds a resource by the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the resource to be found. The name is unique for each resource. It is used to identify the resource. It is a string.

    • findByName

      public ResourceEntity findByName(String name)
      Finds a resource by the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the resource to be found. The name is unique for each resource. It is used to identify the resource. It is a string.

    • getResourceDetails

      public List<Object[]> getResourceDetails(int page, int resourcesPerPage, String brand, ResourceTypeENUM type, Integer supplierId, String name, String nameAsc, String typeAsc, String brandAsc, String supplierAsc, RejectedIdsDto rejectedIds)
      Retrieves detailed information about resources, supporting pagination, sorting, and filtering. This method dynamically constructs a query based on provided parameters to fetch resources.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number for pagination.
      resourcesPerPage - The number of resources to display per page.
      brand - The brand of the resources to filter by.
      type - The type of the resources to filter by.
      supplierId - The ID of the supplier to filter resources by.
      name - The name of the resources to filter by.
      nameAsc - Sort order for resource names, true for ascending, false for descending.
      typeAsc - Sort order for resource types, true for ascending, false for descending.
      brandAsc - Sort order for brands, true for ascending, false for descending.
      supplierAsc - Sort order for suppliers, true for ascending, false for descending.
      rejectedIds - DTO containing IDs of resources to exclude from the results.
      Returns:
      A list of Object arrays containing resource details.

    • getNumberOfResources

      public int getNumberOfResources(String brand, ResourceTypeENUM type, Integer supplierId, String name, RejectedIdsDto rejectedIds)
      Calculates the total number of resources that match the given filters.
      Parameters:
      brand - The brand of the resources to filter by.
      type - The type of the resources to filter by.
      supplierId - The ID of the supplier to filter resources by.
      name - The name of the resources to filter by.
      rejectedIds - DTO containing IDs of resources to exclude from the count.
      Returns:
      The total number of resources matching the filters.

    • getAllBrands

      public List<String> getAllBrands()
      Retrieves all unique brands of resources.
      Returns:
      A list of all brands.

    • getAllNames

      public List<String> getAllNames()
      Retrieves all unique names of resources.
      Returns:
      A list of all resource names.

    • findResourceByDetails

      public ResourceEntity findResourceByDetails(String name, String brand, ResourceTypeENUM type, String supplierName)
      Finds a resource by its detailed attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the resource.
      brand - The brand of the resource.
      type - The type of the resource.
      supplierName - The name of the supplier associated with the resource.
      Returns:
      The found ResourceEntity or null if no matching resource is found.

    • resourceHasSupplier

      public boolean resourceHasSupplier(int resourceId, int supplierId)
      Checks if a resource is associated with a given supplier.
      Parameters:
      resourceId - The ID of the resource.
      supplierId - The ID of the supplier.
      Returns:
      true if the resource is associated with the supplier, false otherwise.

    • doesResourceExist

      public boolean doesResourceExist(String name, String brand, ResourceTypeENUM type, String supplierName)
      Checks if a resource exists with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the resource.
      brand - The brand of the resource.
      type - The type of the resource.
      supplierName - The name of the supplier associated with the resource.
      Returns:
      true if a resource with the given attributes exists, false otherwise.

    • doesResourceExistWithId

      public boolean doesResourceExistWithId(String name, String brand, ResourceTypeENUM type, String supplierName, int id)
      Checks if a resource exists with the given attributes and a specific ID.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the resource.
      brand - The brand of the resource.
      type - The type of the resource.
      supplierName - The name of the supplier associated with the resource.
      id - The ID of the resource to exclude from the check.
      Returns:
      true if a resource with the given attributes exists excluding the specified ID, false otherwise.

    • getResourcesFromProjectId

      public List<Object[]> getResourcesFromProjectId(int projectId)
      Retrieves resources associated with a specific project ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project.
      Returns:
      A list of Object arrays containing details of resources associated with the project.
